Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.implementation

Class NoteServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.implementation.NoteServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NoteService
@Service public class NoteServiceImpl extends Object implements NoteService
Implementation of the NoteService interface. Provides methods for managing notes.
